Substitution.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Substitution (_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', formKey varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', dateSubst date NOT NULL, period varchar(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', type varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Sonstige', lesson varchar(10) NOT NULL , lessonSubst varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', room varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', roomSubst varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', annotation varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
Substitution.insert: INSERT INTO Substitution (formKey, dateSubst, period, type, lesson, lessonSubst, room, roomSubst, annotation ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

Events.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Events (_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', title varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', eventDate date NOT NULL, dateString varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', description varchar(350) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
Events.insert: INSERT INTO Events (title, eventDate, dateString, description) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

Teachers.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Teachers (_id int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'KEY', firstName varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', lastName varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', shorthand varchar(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', subjects varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', email varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (_id)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
Teachers.insert: INSERT INTO Teachers (firstName, lastName, shorthand, subjects, email) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
